bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology-System and software life cycle processes-Reuse processes
IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology-System and software life cycle processes-Reuse processes
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1517/D3, Jan 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A common framework for extending the system and software life cycle processes of IEEE Std 12207-2008 to include the systematic practice of reuse is provided. This standard specifies the processes, activities, and tasks to be applied during each life cycle process to enable a system and/or product to be constructed from reusable assets. It also specifies the processes, activities, and tasks to enable the identification, construction, maintenance, and management of assets supplied.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
